invoices.searchPlaceholder: Shakisha ukoresheje nimero y’inyemezabuguzi cyangwa indangamizigo...
invoices.invoiceDetailsComingSoon: Uburyo bwo kureba ibisobanuro by’inyemezabuguzi bugiye kuza
invoices.bulkDownloadComingSoon: Uburyo bwo gukuramo byinshi icyarimwe bugiye kuza
invoices.paymentInstructionsText: Niba wishyuye mu buryo butaziguye, ugomba kohereza ifoto cyangwa inyemezabwishyu yerekana neza amafaranga n'irangamuntu ry'ibyakozwe. Itsinda ryacu rizabisuzuma.
invoices.cardPaymentDescription: Ishyura ukoresheje Visa, Mastercard, cyangwa izindi karita
invoices.mobileMoneyDescription: Ishyura ukoresheje MTN Mobile Money cyangwa Airtel Money
invoices.cardPaymentInfo: Ikarita zifite Visa, Mastercard, n'izindi karita mpuzamahanga. Uzajyanwa ku rupapuro rwizewe rwo kwishyura.
invoices.mobileMoneyInfo: Ishyura utunguye kuri konti yawe ya MTN cyangwa Airtel mobile money. Uzabona ubutumwa kuri telefone yawe kugira ngo wemeze ubwishyu.
invoices.securePaymentInfo: Ubwishyu bwawe burakozerwa mu buryo bwizewe. Ntabwo twabika amakuru yawe y'ubwishyu.
invoices.mobileMoneyPhoneLabel: Nimero ya Telefone ya Mobile Money
invoices.step1: Andika nimero ya telefone yawe ya MTN cyangwa Airtel
invoices.step3: Reba telefone yawe kugira ngo ubone icyifuzo cyo kwishyura
invoices.step4: Injiza PIN yawe kugira ngo wemeze ubwishyu
invoices.waitingForApproval: Tegereza kwemeza ubwishyu kuri telefone yawe...
invoices.enterPhoneToPay: Andika nimero ya telefone yawe kugira ngo wishyure ukoresheje mobile money
invoices.dontCloseWindow: Ibi bishobora gufata iminota itarenze 5. Nyamuneka ntugafunge idirishya.
invoices.noPromptInstructions: Niba utabonye inyifato y'ubwishyu kuri telefone yawe:
invoices.mtnUssdCode: Kuri MTN Mobile Money, koresha *182*7*1# hanyuma ukurikire amabwiriza
invoices.airtelUssdCode: Kuri Airtel Money, koresha *185*1# hanyuma ukurikire amabwiriza
invoices.followInstructions: Kurikira amabwiriza kuri telefone yawe kugira ngo wishyure ubwishyu

adminAssignments.noAssignmentsDescription: Nta mirimo ihuye nibyo ushakisha. Gerageza guhindura uko ushakisha cyangwa utange indi mirimo.
adminAssignments.capacityWarning: Iburira:Ibiro by’imizigo wahisemo birenze ubushobozi bw’ikinyabiziga. Hitamo ikinyabiziga cyangwa imizigo bitandukanye.

userManagement.resendVerificationFailed: Kwohereza imeyili yemeza byanze. Nyamuneka gerageza nanone.

hero.title: Ohereza imizigo yawe,
hero.subtitle: kurikirana buri kirometelo cy'urugendo
hero.description: Urubuga rwihariye kandi rwizewe mu by'ubwikorezi ruhuza abakiriya, abashoferi ndetse nabagenzura ibinyabiziga hamwe no gukurikirana ikinyabigiza aho kiri hose. Tuguha serivise aho waba uherereye hose mugihugu. Komeza Ubucuruzi bwawe hamwe na sisiteme yo gucunga neza ubwikorezi bw'imizigo yawe.
hero.descriptionShort: Urubuga rwihariye rwo kohereza imizigo rufite uburyo bwo gukurikirana mu gihe nyacyo n'amahitamo yo kwishyura byizewe.

book.title: Andikisha Imizigo yawe yo Koherezwa
book.description: Uzuza amakuru y’aho Umuzigo wawe uzatorwa n’aho uzagezwa, ubone igiciro ako kanya, hanyuma uhitemo igihe wifuza cyo kukugezaho umuzigo wawe

track.title: Kurikirana umuzigo wawe
track.description: Akira link yo gukurikirana, urebe aho bigeze mu gihe nyacyo, kandi umenye uko byifashe uko bihindutse.

receive.title: Akira umuzigo wawe
receive.description: Umushoferi arakugeraho aho uri, wemeze itangwa ukoresheje ifoto, kandi utange amanota kuri serivisi wahawe

mobile.title: Kwishyura kuri Telefone
mobile.description: Koresha MTN, Airtel cyangwa izindi serivisi za mobile money

bank.title: Kohereza kuri Banki
bank.description: Koresha konti zacu za banki mu kwishyura

online.title: Kwishyura kuri murandasi
online.description: Koresha uburyo bwo kwishyura hifashishijwe murandasi

benefits.title: Kuki Wahitamo Loveway Logistics?
benefits.subtitle: Dutanga ibisubizo byuzuye mu by'ubwikorezi dukoresheje ikoranabuhanga rigezweho na serivisi zidasanzwe!!,Utasanga ahandi

realTimeTracking.title: Kurikirana umuzigo wawe mu gihe nyacyo
realTimeTracking.description: Reba amakuru ya GPS ako kanya kugira ngo umenye aho umuzigo wawe ugeze igihe cyose

securePayments.title: Kwishyura Byizewe
securePayments.description: Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kwishyura burimo mobile money n’ikoreshwa rya banki

reliableDrivers.title: Abashoferi Bizera
reliableDrivers.description: Abashoferi bemewe, bafite ubunyamwuga kandi bafite ubwishingizi

fastDelivery.title: Kohereza Imizigo Vuba
fastDelivery.description: Inzira nziza yo Kohereza imizigo yawe vuba kandi neza

support.title: Serivisi 24/7
support.description: Serivisi y’abakiriya iboneka igihe cyose ayikeneye

transparentPricing.title: Ibiciro muburyo Bugaragara
transparentPricing.description: Nta mafaranga yihishe, igiciro kigaragara bitewe ni ntera n’uburemere

howItWorks.title: Uko Bikora
howItWorks.subtitle: Biroroshye, vuba kandi birizewe,shaka umuzigo wawe mu ntambwe eshatu gusa

services.title: Serivisi Dutanga
services.subtitle: Ibisubizo byuzuye byo kohereza imizigo byateguwe ku buryo buhuye n'ibyo ukeneye.

scheduled.title: Kohereza Biteganijwe
scheduled.description: Tegura uko imizigo yawe izoherezwa mbere

fragile.title: Ibintu Byoroshye
fragile.description: Kubika no gutwara imizigo yoroshye neza

documents.title: Gutwara Inyandiko
documents.description: Gutwara inyandiko na pakegi mu buryo bwizewe

business.title: Kohereza ibicuruzwa
business.description: Igisubizo kidasanzwe mu gutwara ibicuruzwa by’ubucuruzi

paymentOptions.title: Amahitamo yo Kwishyura
paymentOptions.subtitle: Hitamo uburyo bwo kwishyura bukoroheye.
paymentOptions.secureBadge: Ubwishyu bwose burakomeye kandi bufite ubwigenge

trackingFeatures.title: Ibiranga Kurikirana Bigezweho
trackingFeatures.subtitle: Komeza ukurikirane imizigo yawe muri buri ntambwe y’urugendo.

liveGps.title: Kurikirana GPS mu Gihe Nyacyo
liveGps.description: Reba aho imizigo yawe iri neza

route.title: Kubona inzira
route.description: Reba uburyo bwateguwe bwo gutwara umuzigo wawe

notifications.title: Amakuru y’Ubuzima bw’Imizigo
notifications.description: Amakuru atangwa kuri SMS na email

photos.title: Amashusho yo Kwemeza Itangwa
photos.description: Emeza ko imizigo yagejejwe aho yajyaga ukoresheje amashusho

testimonials.title: Ibivugwa n'Abakiriya bacu
testimonials.subtitle: Ntitwivugira ahubeo ibikorwa birivugira, reba ubuhamya bwa bamwe mubakiriya twakoranye.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: Loveway Logistics yaduhinduriye imikorere. Ubu kohereza ibicurunzwa birihuta kandi birizewe!

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.content: Ni uburyo bwiza bwo kugeza ibintu ku bakiriya bacu kuri internet. Bakunda cyane uburyo bwo gukurikirana ibyo baguze!

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.content: Serivisi nziza kandi ku gihe. Uburyo bwo gukurikirana mu gihe nyacyo bubyura umutima.

pricingSection.title: Ibiciro biboneye
pricingSection.subtitle: Ibiciro bisobanutse neza kandi biboneye bitewe nibigize umuzigo wawe
pricingSection.getQuoteDescription: Injiza ibisobanuro by'ibyo wohereza kugira ngo ubone igiciro nyacyo.

faq.title: Ibibazo Bikunze Kubazwa
faq.subtitle: Sobanukirwa ibisubizo by'ibibazo bisanzwe ku mikorere yacu.

tracking.question: Ese nigute nakurikirana ibyoherejwe?
tracking.answer: Nyuma yo gutumiza serivisi, uhabwa link yo gukurikirana biciye kuri SMS na email. Ushobora no gukurikirana ibyoherejwe byawe mu gihe nyacyo ukoresheje urubuga rwacu cyangwa application.

payment.question: Ese mwakira ubuhe buryo bwo kwishyura?
payment.answer: Dukoresha Mobile Money (MTN, Airtel), kohereza kuri banki, kwishyura kuri murandasi, ndetse no kwishyura muntoki mugihe bishoboka.

delivery.question: Ese kohereza bitwara igihe kingana gute?
delivery.answer: Igihe cyo kohereza giterwa n’intera n’ubwoko bwa serivisi. Kohereza mu munsi umwe birashoboka mugihe byihutirwa, naho ibisanzwe bifata iminsi 1-3 y’akazi.

damage.question: Ese bizagenda bite niba umuzigo wange wangiritse?
damage.answer: Abashoferi bacu bose barishingiwe kandi dufite politiki yuzuye ijyanye n'ibyangiritse.Ihutire kutumenyesha ako kanya nimba habayeho kwangirika.

address.question: Ese nshobora guhindura aderesi?
address.answer: Yego Rwose, ushobora guhindura aderesi ya delivery nibura mu masaha 2 mbere y’igihe cyateganyijwe ukoresheje application cyangwa ukavugana nababishitswe.

weekend.question: Ese mutanga serivisi muri wikendi?
weekend.answer: Yego rwose, dutanga serivisi muri wikende ku kiguzi cyiyongereyeho. Ushobora kuyihitamo igihe watumizaga serivisi.

helpCta.title: Ufite ibibazo byinshi?
helpCta.description: Ntushobora kubona igisubizo ushakisha? Nyamuneka vugana n'ikipe yacu y'abantu baneza.

contact.title: Tuvugishe
contact.subtitle: Menyesha ikipe yacu ikibazo uhuye nacyo cyangwa ubufasha ukeneye.

getStarted.title: Witeguye Gutangira?
getStarted.subtitle: Injira mu bihumbi by'abakiriya banyuzwe kandi bizera Loveway Logistics mu gutanga imizigo yabo.

footer.description: Urubuga rwihariye kandi rwizewe mu by'ubwikorezi ruhuza abakiriya, abashoferi ndetse nabagenzura ibinyabiziga hamwe no gukurikirana ikinyabigiza aho kiri hose. Tuguha serivise aho waba uherereye hose mugihugu, rufite uburyo bwo gukurikirana Ibyoherejwe mu gihe nyacyo no kwishyura byizewe.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Loveway Logistics Platform. Uburenganzira bwose burabitswe.

downloadApp.title: Kuramo Application yacu
downloadApp.subtitle: Menya byinshi kuri Loveway Logistics wifashishije telefone yawe

vehicles.title: Ibikoresho byacu byo Gutwara
vehicles.subtitle: Hitamo ikoresho cy'ukuri k'ibikoresho byawe. Dufite ibikoresho byinshi byo gutwara ibikoresho byose.

truck.name: Imodoka Nini
truck.description: Ikwiriye cyane ku bicuruzwa binini, ibikoresho by’ubwubatsi n’ibikoresho biremereye. Amakamyo yacu arakomeye cyane afite uburyo bugezweho bwo gukurikirana imizigo no kurinda umutekano wayo.

van.name: Vani
van.description: Ni nziza cyane ku mapaki afatika, impapuro, n’ibyo gutanga ibicuruzwa ku bucuruzi buto. Irihuta kandi ikora neza cyane cyane mu mijyi.

motorcycle.name: Moto
motorcycle.description: Ikwiriye cyane ibikoresho byihutirwa, impapuro n'udupaki duto. Irihuta mu muhanda no mugihe kibinyabiziga byinshi, ishobora gukoreshwa mukohereza mu munsi umwe.
